name: Bulk Naturals Wholesale - Cold-Pressed Safflower Oil
description: Bulk Naturals Wholesale offers cold-pressed Safflower Oil in two varieties: High-Oleic (10.2g monounsaturated fat per serving) and High-Linoleic (72.31% linoleic acid, 16% oleic acid). These natural fatty acid sources provide barrier repair, moisturization, and carrier oil benefits with glass packaging options.
notes: Two varieties provide formulation flexibility: High-Oleic for penetration enhancement, High-Linoleic for essential fatty acid content. Cold-pressed ensures quality and preserves beneficial compounds. Glass packaging options prevent oxidation. Natural source of barrier repair lipids.
